data.persona: I am a mutated animal of the kingdom. Travelers fear my presence and face. I scare little children walking.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to church.
The entrance to the church can only be described as a bit scary.  It is overgrown with mosses and weeds.  It has not been taken care of and is a mixture of wood and stone.  It is dirty, and things live here.
There's a weed, a Gravestone, a ghost, and a moss here.
The trolls and the zombie are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to show the zombie I am friendly.
data.mid_motivation: I want to team up with the zombie and the other monsters around the church to scare away all the people who go to the church.
data.long_motivation: I want to claim the land around the church for myself and my friends, since humans keep trying to kill me or keep disturbing my rest and I am sick of it.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use scary, mutated face with church visitors
